name: The Fate of Greenvale
description:
Following an unknown disaster, the sleepy little mining town of Greenvale and the surrounding areas have been cursed with a plague of undead. But there's someone important to you there, someone you know must still be alive. The question is, how much are you willing to risk in the name of friendship?

This is a sequel to (and a little more serious in tone than) The Painter of Devil's Fangs. That being said, it's not really necessary to play the previous game to understand this one.

All writing, art, and programming by me. (I almost died making this game! Not literally, but you know.)
